Interrupts.Name: Wish
Interrupts.Trigger: An ally in range 6 is reduced to 0 hp.
Interrupts.Effects: That ally returns to 25% hp instead, then the the [name] sacrifices 25% of its maximum hp.

Actions.Name: Chastise
Actions.Effects: A character in range takes 1 piercing damage. If that character attacks before the end of their next turn, they take [D]+[fray] piercing damage again and this effect ends.

Actions.Name: Pilfer Luck
Actions.Effects: The [name] marks a foe in range. While marked the foe cannot gain boons, and the Hob gains +1 boon on all its attacks and saves. A foe can end this mark by choosing to roll all attacks and saves with +1 curse for their entire turn. The mark then ends.

Actions.Name: Inside Out
Actions.Description: The [name] curses a foe with awful nausea. If that foe moves more than 1 space or uses any ability that costs 2 actions on their turn, they must save. On a failed save, they take damage equal to 50% of their maximum HP and are stunned. If they succeed on the save, they take damage equal to 25% of their maximum HP.

Actions.Name: Ancient Heal
Actions.Description: The [name] gains aura 2 until the start of their next turn. All characters in the aura that start their turn there gain 2 vigor.
